summary: A new inn with 6 new Companions, 5 of them hirelings the other who gives his services for free. It is located across the river from Hjaalmarch Stormcloak camp. All 9 of the new NPCs have a custom routine and either have a job at the new inn or are a customer, enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
A new inn with 6 new Companions, 5 of them hirelings the other who gives his services for free. It is located across the river from Hjaalmarch Stormcloak camp. All 9 of the new NPCs have a custom routine and either have a job at the new inn or are a customer, enjoy!

NPC Relationships Document = https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dv6V51KNOhSa4UWqhYyX2tTvAKFgBqFPad8QRoJPjHQ/edit#heading=h.62jr98hmfx2

All companions (discluding Jagar Tharn XXII who is a doofus) have the light foot perk, meaning they will not set off traps!!!

New Companions and their Class and Race
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dagoke Rock-Fist - Nord - Warrior 2H
Tynvir Rock-Fist - Nord - Ranger
Philnacis Tailamont - Breton - Sorcerer (Level 18 or higher Suggested)
Zugarod Gro Steel - Orc - Tank (Free Service)
Valla the Wild - Nord - Thief
Jagar Tharn XXII - High Elf - Monk
Tulath - Dark Elf - Lumberjack (NOT a Companion)
Wessen - Redguard - Blacksmith Trainer Expert (NOT a Companion)
Burgen - Nord - Innkeeper/ Food Salesman/ Rent0Room (NOT a Companion)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PLANNED NEW FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-Custom Voice Acting (Need Voice Actors, feel free to volunteer with sample of Voice Acting in a Comment)

-Mosspeak Inn Questline
-More Companions
-Mosspeak Village

DON't FORGET TO ENDORSE!!!
author: GuitarZeppole
